data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Saint Mary Cayon a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cayon
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cayon, Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Saint Mary Cayon against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.focus_label: Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 3,500 people living in Saint Mary Cayon.

location.name: Saint Mary Cayon
location.full_name: Saint Mary Cayon, Saint Kitts and Nevis
